name: Potential SAP NetWeaver Webshell Creation
description:
Detects the creation of suspicious files (jsp, java, class) in SAP NetWeaver directories,
which may indicate exploitation attempts of vulnerabilities such as CVE-2025-31324.
author: Elastic (idea)
Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate creation of jsc or java files in these locations
query: FROM logs-* metadata _id, _version, _index | WHERE ((file.path.text rlike ".*\\\\[Jj]2[Ee][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Aa][Pp].[Cc][Oo][Mm]\\\\[Ii][Rr][Jj]\\\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ll][Ee][Tt]_[Jj][Ss][Pp]\\\\[Ii][Rr][Jj]\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk].*" or file.path.text rlike ".*\\\\[Jj]2[Ee][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Aa][Pp].[Cc][Oo][Mm]\\\\[Ii][Rr][Jj]\\\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ll][Ee][Tt]_[Jj][Ss][Pp]\\\\[Ii][Rr][Jj]\\\\[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt].*") and (file.path.text rlike ".*.[Jj][Ss][Pp].*" or file.path.text rlike ".*.[Jj][Aa][Vv][Aa].*" or file.path.text rlike ".*.[Cc][Ll][Aa][Ss][Ss].*"))
